recipe.title: Duck Rice
recipe.instructions: Add duck and rice in rice cooker for 1 hour

recipe.title: Chicken Rice
recipe.instructions: Add chicken and rice in rice cooker for 1 hour

recipe.title: Fried Rice
recipe.instructions: Fry rice and eggs until fried

recipe.title: Sambal Fried Rice
recipe.instructions: Fry rice with eggs and chilli until fried
